title: I Cant buy Zoe
body:
Apparently I cant buy Zoe because the only way I can buy the new champ is with a mystery token but I already have all champs so I get the error. 
I dont want to buy a mystery token I want to buy Zoe straight with blue essence... wtf that is stupid, that made my ****** day ,  ? thanks RIOT

replies.body:
It looks like Zoe just became available!  New skins and content won't appear immediately after release in hextech loot.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you'll want to wait at least a day to become available in loot.  

You should see her in the store at this time to unlock her with BE.

It always takes a little till u can actually buy the champ
Maybe she will be realesed in the evening or tomorrow
I can't log in ... I want only to play not to buy :(
